sections.title: Gathering Spells
sections.description: Test @Focus to gather a spell. If you succeed, you can draw a spell card from your spell deck and keep this card until your next @NightsRest.
sections.mechanics: Roll 1d10 against @Focus. If the roll is equal to or less than your @Focus score, draw one spell from your deck.
sections.limits: You can only have 3 spells gathered at one time.

sections.title: Casting Spells
sections.description: You can play spell cards at any time, triggering their effect. Follow the instructions on the spell card.
sections.targeting: You cannot target something with a spell if you cannot perceive it, although you might still be able to harm it. You cannot select a target without a clear unbroken line from you to the location of it.
sections.recovery: Discarded spells can be returned to your spell deck when you complete a @NightsRest.
